title: Crime Novel Selection

contents.note: Martin Goodman: The Crime Digest Paperbacks (scroll down to 'Crime Novel Selection')

renewed-issues.note: Novel title: The Submarine Signaled... Murder!
Novel title: 3 Girls and a Killer
Novel title: Death is the Host

additional-notes: A note in the 1970 CCE Periodcals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for renewals for 'Crime Novel Selection'. Notes in the 1971 CCE Periodicals volume say to 'consult copyright office' for renewals for 'Murder for What?' and 'The Submarine Signaled... Murder!'.  Notes in the July-December 1971 CCE Books volume say to consult the copyright office for renewals for 'Death is the Host' and 'Three Girls and a Killer'.

The renewal for issue 1 was recorded in the January-June 1970 CCE Books volume under its novel title 'Strangler's Holiday'. Issues 2-4 were renewed in 1970 and 1971, though the renewals were not recorded until the July-December 1977 Periodicals volume. Renewals for issues 5 and 6 were filed in 1971 and recorded in the 1978 volume, under their novel titles.
